songs.title: Tilt
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
If ya'll want me to turn up some sound say turn it up say turn it up
We got the bldg on tilt (x7)
What ya doing slyy
Rollingggg

[Verse 1: N.O.R.E.]
Gun play nore shoot'm in they own hood gun play security say chill nigga fuck that
The liquor make a nigga stick a nigga thumb tack they say son back an it's a fun fact our garbage candy land is where I dump at
Slide forward the world on tilt
Aged to greek I destroy what I built

[Verse 2: Busta Rhymes]
Let me say it this way if you don't understand I fucks the place up bitch
Part of my language
We bouncin on the beat like I was squeaking the mattress and beats you in the head until you need you a bandage
Fuck a block like I just fronted you 9bricks
My money long call me cash register rhymes bitch my nigga ball heavy like my homey Labron do
Got the building on tilt exactly how the heroin do

[Chorus]
We got the bldg on tilt
Swirv swirv
We got the bldg on tilt
Get money get money
We got the bldg on tilt
Reek da villian
We got the bldg on tilt
Conglomerate
We got the bldg on tilt
Get money get money
We got the bldg on tilt
Orlean orlean
We got the bldg on tilt
Reek da villian the prince

[Verse 3: Reek Da Villian]
I got the club on lean
Like everyone sippin codeine from methazine an all these pretty ladies they tryin to be next to me and
Yeah my diamonds glowing like crystal amphetamines
Uhh fuck a 10
My swagger need a 20
I graduated with honors in the academy's of money
Rolls on freeze about blow up OC and leave the bldg on tilt like "at a be a scum"

[Verse 4: Spliff Starr]
Now I ain't go to rap

[Chorus]
We got the bldg on tilt
Swirv swirv
We got the bldg on tilt
Get money get money
We got the bldg on tilt
Reek da villian
We got the bldg on tilt
Conglomerate
We got the bldg on tilt
Get money get money
We got the bldg on tilt
Orlean orlean
We got the bldg on tilt

[Verse 5: J-Doe]

[Chorus]
We got the bldg on tilt
Swirv swirv
We got the bldg on tilt
Get money get money
We got the bldg on tilt
Reek da villian
We got the bldg on tilt
Conglomerate
We got the bldg on tilt
Get money get money
We got the bldg on tilt
Orlean orlean
We got the bldg on tilt
